title: Riding the tiger
brief_description: Riding the Tiger is a series examining the history of Indonesia since the struggle for independence in 1945. The series focuses on the military organisation of Indonesian society and on the consequences of colonial rule on Indonesian politics and culture.
description: Riding the Tiger is a series examining the history of Indonesia since the struggle for independence in 1945. The series focuses on the military organisation of Indonesian society and on the consequences of colonial rule on Indonesian politics and culture.
